to talk a lot in a boring, stupid, or annoying way: They're always drivelling about me meeting Mr Right and getting married. I've just been listening to Aunt Elsie drivelling on.
More examplesFewer examplesWhy do we have to listen to him drivelling on about something he clearly knows nothing about? Next time she starts drivelling in public about how "My family is THE most important thing in the world," pardon me if I just laugh."For God's sake," she said, "what are you drivelling on about?"It calms me down when someone rings up and drivels on about nothing.
